sentence.text: To date, there are no reports of symptomatic improvement in bile acid biosynthetic process related ataxia following treatment with Riluzole.
We report the case of a 45 year old woman diagnosed with bile acid biosynthetic process-related cerebellar ataxia.
Thus, in addition to the standard therapy with CDCA, the addition of Riluzole may have some therapeutic benefits for ataxia caused by bile acid biosynthetic process.
